vehicles.description: There is a sedan driving in the same direction ahead on the same lane.
vehicles.explanation: This vehicle is directly in the path of my car, dictating the following distance and speed that my car should maintain.

traffic cones.description: Reflective traffic cones have been placed on the right side of the road.
traffic cones.explanation: These indicate the direction of traffic flow and may signify the closing or shifting of lanes.

barriers.description: Yellow barriers have been placed on the right side of the road.
barriers.explanation: Notice: This indicates that the road section may be closed or under construction. It is necessary to drive carefully and you may need to merge left.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the image observed, there is a sedan driving ahead in the same direction and lane as my vehicle. This sedan requires my car to maintain an appropriate following distance and adjust speed accordingly to ensure safe driving conditions.

On the right side of the road, reflective traffic cones are placed, indicating the flow of traffic and possibly suggesting the closing or shifting of the traffic lanes. These cones guide my car on where to drive and to be alert for potential changes in the lane patterns.

Additionally, yellow barriers are also present on the right side of the road, signaling that the road may be closed or under construction. These barriers require my car to drive with increased caution and preparedness to merge left if necessary to continue to navigate safely through the traffic.

There are no vulnerable road users, traffic signs, traffic lights, or other objects reported in the image, implying that these elements do not impact the driving behavior of my autonomous vehicle at this time.

driving_suggestion: Drive carefully and maintain a safe distance from the vehicle ahead, paying attention to any changes in lanes or speed adjustments. Visible traffic cones and temporary obstacles indicate that part of the road ahead is closed or under construction, so be prepared to merge left. As the road surface may be slippery, ensure a safe driving speed and allow for a longer stopping distance.

2.description and explanation: A traffic cone is a cone-shaped marker that is typically used to redirect traffic temporarily. Its presence on a roadway usually indicates construction, road work, or an area that requires caution when driving. For the ego car, encountering a traffic cone would necessitate a reduction in speed and possibly a change in direction to ensure a safe distance is maintained from the designated work zone or obstacle.
